title: griddy
author: griddy
content: Hi, I am an owner of a brand new (not yet public) blog site.I am hiring bloggers, that will be paid on monthly basis (revenue share based).How it will work:You will write a blog article, admnis will approve (or reject for correction) Publisher dashboard is available for publishers - here is an article manager and articles editor.Once approved, you will get paid for a lifetime for this article, based on Google Analytic engagement monthly report for that post in the given month.Login with your FaucetPay email addressPayments in USDT to FaucetPayThe fully organic traffic is our job, not yours. You just need to produce quality articles Public kick-off 15th of july 2022What we are awaiting from you:100% original articles100% fluent english Plagiarism-free (we will check you)At least 300 words / article, more better (upto 2000+)SEO articles, research, reviews, comparations, news  are allowed, product promotions also, but illegal or agressive content no.Be unique, maybe funny , or just professionalBe loyal , it will worth and generate a passive stable income to you!Allowed blog categories: Tech , Crypto, Lifestyle or Other (here only very very interesting articles)If you interested, ping me

I might be able to write about climate, pandemics, etc based on conspiracies by using my language. can i do it?  ~snipNo, OP might not be interested because you missed the second requirement, read it again.Also, I think what OP is looking for are professional article writers just like those who know the proper writing (first letter of a specific name, the word "I" in capitalize or upper case).Text (user) is correct, 100% fluent english with professional (or funny) content. It must be eye catching and interesting for the readers.I checked Fiverr and Upwork, and tested one guy from Pakistan. The result is confusing, but it was "only 6 $ my friend"  . The good(better) ones wants 10-50$ per article, or even more and they wants to get paid in their platform (which is completely normal).We will pay in crypto, monthly - to FaucetPay. Let me compare my Fiverr gig with our plans for the future:The guy wrote me the article in 30 hours, i paid 6$ (more with some taxes) at the beginning with unclear resultsThe effect: the guy got 6$ at the very first day, we got the article, we won't get too much income from it , because it's grammarly OK, but on the other hand, it's not professional at all.:Our vision: The publishers will write an article, we will check , approve or reject for correctionOur publishers won't be paid at the very beginning, but they will get a lifetime revenue share from all of their articles!In comparation; Fiverr guy took 6$ immediately, our publishers will get $$$ / article every month (depends on engagements based on Google Analytics)Traffic / promotion is our business, we will keep our publishers to work without disturbing   That's it in a nutshell. I got not so much responseso far, maybe we are doing something wrong...
